title: Large Closets, Community Garden, Complimentary Electric Car Charging
posting_body: This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 570 Sq.
The Reserve at Bucklin Hill offers a new style of living, tucked away into the best parts of the Pacific Northwest.
Located in Silverdale, WA, our 1, 2 and 3-bedroom homes offer an uncommon connection to the beauty of the Northwest outdoors and the buzz of urban life.
With warm, newly renovated apartment homes, it truly is a place to press your recharge button.
Welcome home to the Reserve at Bucklin Hill!
Stainless steel appliances, Patio or Lanai, Wood burning fireplaces, Granite, Breakfast Bar, Large Closets

Package Receiving Hub, New Outdoor sport court, Spa/Hot Tub, Business Center, Heated Swimming Pool, Scenic nature trails, Complimentary Electric Car Charging, State of the art fitness center, Great room with stone fireplace, Basketball Court, New Playground, Outdoor patio with Gas Grilling and lounge seating, Community Garden
Gross income 2.5 times the monthly rent.
